quote: A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable but more useful than a life spent doing nothing. – George Bernard Shaw
fact: The scene where Indiana Jones shoots the swordsman in Raider’s of the Lost Ark was Harrison Ford's idea so that he could take a bathroom break.
joke: Did you know you should always take an extra pair of pants golfing? Just in case you get a hole in one.
